section.title: Document Tracking
section.para: The Document Tracking function allows you to view various types of pending documents required by the bank for the purposes of loan processing. These documents may include compliance documents and legal or tax documents.

section.title: Document Tracking Options
section.para: The menu for this module has the following groups of functions.

listitem.para: A list of all documents that are linked to the loans availed by your company or have applied for.

section.title: Compliance Documents
section.para: This feature allows you to list pending compliance documents against the selected borrower. These documents relate to the borrower compliance monitoring required by the bank when issuing a loan. Loan IQ will receive these documents and a document analyst will review them before updating the document status in Loan IQ.

section.title: Compliance Documents List
section.para: You can retrieve a list of borrower compliance documentation from Loan IQ by entering search criteria and clicking the Search button. You can enter or select from Borrower Reference, Due Date; From and To, Document Type and Deal Name to view details in the columns: Document Id, Document Type, Document Date, Due Date, Customer and Deal Name.
